title: Filter Out Matching Array Elements
description: In this lab, we will be exploring how to filter out matching array elements using JavaScript. We will learn how to use the Array.prototype.includes() method to find values to exclude and how to implement the Array.prototype.filter() method to create a new array that excludes these values. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to filter out specific elements in an array using JavaScript.

meta.title: Filter Out Matching Elements | JavaScript Array Filtering
meta.description: Learn how to filter out specific elements in a JavaScript array using the includes() and filter() methods. Improve your programming skills with this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: javascript, array, filtering, includes, filter, programming, tutorial

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 过滤匹配的数组元素
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用JavaScript过滤出匹配的数组元素。我们将学习如何使用Array.prototype.includes()方法查找要排除的值，以及如何实现Array.prototype.filter()方法来创建一个排除这些值的新数组。在本实验结束时，你将对如何使用JavaScript过滤数组中的特定元素有扎实的理解。

meta.title: 过滤匹配元素 | JavaScript数组过滤
